articles.content: The HyperX + Ducky One 2 Mini is a 60% keyboard with a twist. It takes the classic Ducky One 2 Mini design and adds HyperX Red linear switches along with replacement keycaps to create something that's pretty cool. This might be the best 60% keyboard collabora… [+1357 chars]

articles.description: Check out the release date trailer for Those Who Remain, the first-person psychological horror game being released on May 28 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and...
articles.content:
Check out the release date trailer for Those Who Remain, the first-person psychological horror game being released on May 28 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam. A Nintendo Switch version is due out this Summer.

articles.description: Mortal Kombat 11's expansion, Aftermath, is releasing on May 26 and will not only add new story content to MK11, but will also welcome Fujin, Sheeva, and Rob...
articles.content:
Mortal Kombat 11's expansion, Aftermath, is releasing on May 26 and will not only add new story content to MK11, but will also welcome Fujin, Sheeva, and RoboCop to the roster.

articles.title: Review: $999 MacBook Air (2020) – Apple’s cheapest laptop is a great entry-level Mac [Video] - 9to5Mac
articles.description: The MacBook Air (2020) is the cheapest laptop that Apple makes, but it's surprisngly well appointed, and a solid machine for basic computing needs.
articles.content: As I noted in my initial hands-on impressions with the $999 MacBook Air, this base model MacBook Air is a good option for Mac users in search of a no-frills laptop experience. If youre the type who primarily uses a laptop for everyday tasks like web browsing,… [+9177 chars]

articles.title: Animal Crossing's Fake Art Does Some Creepy Things - GameSpot
articles.description: Redd is back selling forged artwork in New Horizons, and it looks like some of the pieces might be just a little haunted.
